attachments.title: Mac Miller - Faces (Mixtape) by fistintheair.com
attachments.text:
Mac Miller celebrates Mothers Day with a 24 track mixtape featuring Schoolboy Q, Rick Ross, Earl Sweatshirt, and more. 

DOWNLOAD: <http://bit.ly/FacesDownload>

Like: <http://www.facebook.com/fistintheair>
Follow: <http://www.twitter.com/fistintheair>

Repost if you dig!
attachments.fallback: SoundCloud Audio: Link: Mac Miller - Faces (Mixtape) by fistintheair.com

text: still on the fence about mac miller in gen, but i'm giving it a shot
i think the fact that he's like, boys with Groovy Q, forced me to appreciate him a whole lot more.

Okay, I'm really just a bystander on this thread, reading along to overhear new music, but I wanted to share this syllabus cause I think a few of you might like it. My friend Candice Jenkins is an african american literature professor (at Hunter College in NY), and she taught a really cool class on hip hop narrative a few years ago. Enjoy!
